snippet: A song by Felix Mendelssohn whose whereabouts were unclear for more than 100 years has turned up in a private collection in the United States and will be auctioned.
abstract: A song by Felix Mendelssohn whose whereabouts were unclear for more than 100 years has turned up in a private collection in the United States and will be auctioned.

headline.print_headline: A Lost Mendelssohn Song Surfaces After 140 Years
